text: Bernard Nsayi (1943 - 12 February 2021) was a Congolese Roman Catholic prelate. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Nkayi, Republic of the Congo from 1990 to 2001. He became a priest in 1971. Nsayi died on 12 February 2021, aged 77.Diocese of Nkayi ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Roman Catholic bishops Category:Republic of the Congo people
title: Bernard Nsayi
